<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Maps of asm register numbers to LLVM register numbers, with 0 indicating</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// an invalid register.  In principle we could use 32-bit and 64-bit register</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// classes directly, provided that we relegated the GPR allocation order</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in SystemZRegisterInfo.td to an AltOrder and left the default order</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// as %r0-%r15.  It seems better to provide the same interface for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// all classes though.</span></CodeLine>
